page.title: 07FARMING
page.content: The Colwill's farm is called { {TREBURRICK FARM. It is 85 acres big. {He is a beef farmer and he has mainly {Hereford Cross cattle but he also has {other breeds too. His herd consists of {6 cows, 45 bullocks, 0 bulls, 6 {heifers and 10 calves. Universal 15 is {his Compound Fertiliser for corn, but {he doesn't use straight Nitrogen on {it.He uses a mixed variety of Compound {Fertiliser for grass and Nitro Top is {his kind of straight nitrogen. He does {not cut any silage. He keeps two Ford {Tractors and has all he needs to make {hay and cut corn. He owns the farm and {has changed farms before from {Stapledon Farm in Holsworthy,Devon.He {and his wife have always been {connected to farming since they were {young.Mr.Colwill can drive but {Mrs.Colwill can't.They run a Bed & {Breakfast too as a holiday attraction.
